column4: xrandr just returns an error while trying to add mode-row. Seems to be nvidia related. I guess 1360x768 should be supported by a fairly new nvidiachipset or?
it's stated in the menu of my tv as PC mode, but Monitors states it as unknown monitor, while nvidia-settings has the correct modelnr
I'm not a resolution expert but isn't 1360x768 what was considered 720p atleast way back for TVs?
I use hdmi to a crapy old viewsonic-tv
